name: bs-emotion-ppx
description: Adds labels to CSS classes generated by bs-emotion
author: Alex Fedoseev <alex.fedoseev@gmail.com>

scripts.prepack: rm -rf dist/* && mkdir -p dist/src && yarn run build
scripts.pack: cp package.json dist/ && cp bsconfig.npm.json dist/bsconfig.json && cp lib/bs/native/emotionppx.native dist/ppx
